name: Animal Zoo & Farm Sounds - Fun Noises of peekaboo barn, monkey, dog, cat, Lion, sheep & more
name_original: Animal Zoo & Farm Sounds - Fun Noises of peekaboo barn, monkey, dog, cat, Lion, sheep & more
description:
A Baby must application (6 months – 5 years).

Your child will learn more than 20 sounds of animals in a playful way with this funny app.
Animals Zoo & Farm for Babies is an application which will take you or your child to the magical world of animals and Birds.
Come and play with these cute Animated animals!
Discover the animals in 3 different worlds with your child. By tapping the animals they will move and make their respective noise
Animals Zoo & Farm for Babies is for all models of iPad, iPhone and iPod compatible.

Features:
- Very easy and simple to Play fun game
- Beautifully illustrated Animated animal images
- Clear Animal Sounds

It helps your child to:
- Develop auditory, visual and fine motor skills
- Recognize animals
- Relate animals to their Sounds

With this simple and funny application, baby will have a great time playing with his/her favorite animals.
